Package tud.iir.classification

Class Summary
Categories An ArrayList of categories.
Category A category has a name and a relevance for certain resource.
CategoryEntries Hold a number of category entries.
CategoryEntry Hold information about how relevant a category is.
Classifier  
Dictionary A dictionary holds a list of words with their probabilities/scores of belonging to certain categories.
FeatureEvaluator The FeatureEvaluator can be used to determine the value of features for different classifiers.
FeatureObject  
Helper All methods of this class help importing and exporting data between the database and csv files.
Term  
WordCorrelation  
WordCorrelationMatrix Correlation matrix.
